problem.markdown:
name = "skye homsi"  
name_1 = name.title()
name_2 = name_1.swapcase()
print(name_2)

The output from the above code is ___

( ) "Skye Homsi" ( ) "SKYE HOMSI" ( ) "skye homsi" (x) "sKYE hOMSI"
